Any help would be epic! :D

item.title: Client Error when I compile
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:

lol u dunno how to code man !!!

that means u coded it wrong
u see those arrows that point to something like the first one points to local
it is wrong (i think im not 100% sure)

like on some severs to send messages to people it is .sendmessage and on some it is .sM

u need to fix wat the arrow is pointing to

also if u put in a code and u put it in wrong it could affect everthing and if u just delete it it can fix it so i hope i helped

Read full topic
